comments:
Not sure if it is a duplicate of bug 47852.  Stack is the same, a different 
message though.

Error Dec 01, 2003 07:15:23.693 An internal error occurred during: "Status 
Line Update".
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.asyncExec(Display.java:479)
at org.eclipse.ui.progress.UIJob.run(UIJob.java:88)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)
What were you doing when this occurred?  Anything to do with the Problems View?

Don't recall. Sorry. With a number of jobs going on in the background, and 
these npe's being silently logged, it has become very difficult to provide 
reproducible steps when reporting these types of bugs.

I suspect that this is due to shutdown using a dead display. Wassim could this 
have happened during shutdown.

We need to look at all callers of Display.getDefault() and replace them with 
calls to the workbench API.

Looking at the timestamp, it's very likely that it happened at shutdown.
Yesterday at 7:15 a.m., I shut down my thinkpad to get ready to drive to 
work :-)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47852 ***
